name: Open Rose - Exquisite Glass Pendant Hangs from Oxidized Sterling Silver Rose and Swarovski Crystals
description:
You'll have to see this hanging at the base of your throat to believe it's immense beauty. The dichroic glass behind the rose colored lamp work veil slice creates a window that brings a depth that these photographs cannot capture. The colors are brilliant and there is a poetry to the waves of color as the light dances through it. Clear, faceted, swarovski crystals give this piece an air of elegance and the sterling silver rose gives it a sense of old world charm.

The chain, which is attached to the design, equals about 19". I will add an extender chain if you need this.

The glass pendant itself is about an inch across. (28 mm) 

For more beautiful products from Satori Fire Design please click the link at the top left corner. Thank you for looking.
